topic.title: Viewing and changing the details of a list item
topic.body:
In the list windows, can show you more information in addition to the names of the list items. You can ask the system to display these view details selectively and in a sequence defined by you.
The details contain properties and statistical information of the list items, such as the:
Name of a document
Source language of a
Size of a new terms list
Date when a document was analyzed
Date when a found terms list was updated
Drive where a folder is stored
Details can be displayed for:
Folders
Documents
Dictionaries
New terms lists
Found terms lists
Exclusion lists
Markup table list
<pYou can view the selected details and change which details are displayed on a list window.
